snippet: The stock market returned to record levels as investors purchased tech stocks that had been beaten down to bargain prices.
abstract: Stock market returns to record levels as investors purchase tech stocks that had been beaten down to bargain prices.
lead_paragraph: The stock market returned to record levels as investors purchased tech stocks that had been beaten down to bargain prices.

headline.main: Tech Stocks Lead a Vibrant Market As Investors Cast Caution Aside
headline.print_headline: Tech Stocks Lead a Vibrant Market as Investors Cast Caution Aside
